## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G09720](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G09720)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtRH57, RH57</u>
- **Gene Name:** RNA helicase 57
- **Description:**   P-loop containing nucleoside triphosphate hydrolases superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2075034
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [gcc7]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;high-glucosinolate chemotype caused by overexpression of IQD1 (At3g09710)
